titles.title: A bill to suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on Malathion.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3529)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/23/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 0,0 dimethyl phosphorodithoate of diethyl mercaptosuccinate (malathion).
